text: Support engineering units of degrees Celsius temperature.

success_criteria.text: Create an default value instance of Celsius type with value 0.
Create an instance of Celsius from an initial value of type double.
Allow implicit conversion of Celsius to type double.
Prevent implicit conversion of a numeric value to a Celsius value.
Perform routine math operations on a Celsius values.
Increment a value of Celsius by a given amount.
Decrement a value of Celsius by a given amount.
Create an default value instance of Days type with value 0.
Create an instance of Days from an initial value of type double.
Allow implicit conversion of Days to type double.
Prevent implicit conversion of a numerical valud to a Days value.
Perform routine math operations on a Days values.
Increment a value of Days by a given amount.
Decrement a value of Days by a given amount.
Create an instance of Days from an initial value of type Seconds.
Implement conversion from type Days to type Seconds.
Create an default value instance of Degrees type with value 0.
Create an instance of Degrees from an initial value of type double.
Allow implicit conversion of Degrees to type double.
Prevent implicit conversion of a numerical valud to a Degrees value.
Perform routine math operations on a Degrees values.
Create an instance of Degrees from an initial value of type Radians.
Implement conversion from type Degrees to type Radians.
Create an default value instance of GPS_time type with value week 1, seconds 0.
Create an instance of GPS_time from given initial values of weeks and seconds.
Provide access to the GPS week number.
Provide access to the GPS seconds value.
Increment a value of GPS_time by a given amount of Seconds.
Compute the difference between two instances of GPS_time.
